WorkItem.Description:
I play on the EU Azjol-Nerub realm and RAWR forgets the - between Azjol and Nerub at every given opportunity.
 
Initially I need to type it in correctly and also my char name for import from armory. Afterwards, if I try to reimport my char from armory this error pops up : 
 
== Version: 4.2.3.0 ==
== Error Message ==
{"status":"nok", "reason": "Realm not found."}
== StackTrace ==
No Stack Trace
 
When I try to load a char manually, my char name pops up as it should, but the server name is "Azjol Nerub"  .. without the - 
 
I think that RAWR doesn't store the "-" properly whenever it saves "last used". 
 
This is the problem.
 
Thanks a lot for a good program!!
WorkItem.Summary: [Armory Import] Rawr doesn't save hyphen's in realm names

Comments.Message: I forgot to mention that when I type the name in manually with the hyphen, RAWR ofc imports my char correctly
